title: Hyundai Mobis 3Q Net Profit Jumps 29%
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

Hyundai Mobis Co. Ltd.'s (012330.SE) third-quarter net profit jumped 29% on year as it enjoyed solid revenue growth thanks to robust demand for after-sales parts and electric components for vehicles.

Net profit for the quarter was 581.86 billion Korean won ($497.0 million), the South Korean auto parts maker said Thursday.

The result was below the consensus forecast for net profit of KRW618.90 billion, according to FactSet.

Third-quarter revenue rose 12% on year to KRW9.445 trillion and operating profit rose 31% on year to KRW603.90 billion.

Write to Kwanwoo Jun at kwanwoo.jun@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 04:53 ET (08:53 GMT)
